title: GetLogPropertyReference (Method)
text:
METHOD GetLogPropertyReference : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the device object property reference at index nIndex of the Log_DeviceObjectProperty-Property of this BACnet-Object.

rows.Name: nIndex
rows.Comment: The 1 based index to get the property reference for.

rows.Name: devObjPropRef
rows.Comment: The property reference after a call to this method.
